item.title: View Amazon CloudWatch Automatic Dashboards
item.description: 1. View Amazon CloudWatch Automatic Dashboards Amazon CloudWatch Automatic Dashboards allow you to easily monitor all AWS Resources, and is quick to get started. Explore account and resource-based view of metrics and alarms, and easily drill-down to understand the root cause of performance issues. Open the Amazon CloudWatch console at https://console.aws.amazon.com/cloudwatch/ and select your region from the top menu bar. If you are logging into a brand new AWS account, you will see the default Cloudwatch console such as this: You will need to deploy something into your account to see a Cloudwatch automatic dashboard.

item.title: Teardown
item.description: Remove the dashboard you created The AWS free tier allows for 3 Dashboards for up to 50 metrics per month for free, but to ensure you are not charged for the dashboard, you should remove it if you created one in the previous step.
